SoilBiosample Study Slots Slot Description alternative_id An identifier for a record that can be considered identical to this instance biosample_id An identifier for a Biosmaple record biosample_set A collection of Biosamples derived_from external_id An identifier for a record, in an external system, that is related to this in... gold_biosample_ids An identifier for a GOLD Biosample record that is identical to this instance gold_identifier An identifier for a GOLD record that is related to this instance has_input JsonObj() id The unique identifier for instances of this class linking_id An identifier for a record that is related to this instance in some way related_id An identifier for a record that is related, but not identical, to this instan... studied_in The studies in which the Biosample was used temperature_c The temperature of a sample, in degrees celsius, at the time it was collected Enumerations Enumeration Description Types Type Description xsd:boolean A binary (true or false) value xsd:date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar linkml:DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime xsd:dateTime The combination of a date and time xsd:decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... xsd:double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification xsd:float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification xsd:integer An integer xsd:string Prefix part of CURIE shex:nonLiteral A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model shex:iri A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model xsd:string A character string xsd:dateTime A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... xsd:anyURI a complete URI xsd:anyURI a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
